item.title: Shein and Temu expected to raise prices soon
item.description: Your next purchases from Shein and Temu may soon cost more.

item.title: Mother claims 7-month-old son was kidnapped as she changed his diaper outside store
item.description: Investigators say there are "inconsistencies" in the mother's story, and they have been unable to rule out foul play.

item.title: ‘Guide my bullets’: Woman accused of shooting at neighbor allegedly said prayer before firing
item.description: The victim sustained a brain bleed from bullet fragments in her eye and brain, but her injuries were not considered life-threatening.

item.title: ‘Damaged beyond repair’: Woman accused of pouring salt in ex boyfriend’s car engine, throwing glitter in AC
item.description: A woman in Kentucky is accused of pouring salt in her ex’s car engine and putting glitter in the AC.

item.title: Two suspects enter plea deals in Punta Gorda murder-for-hire case
item.description: Both received sentences of over 10 years in prison for criminal conspiracy to commit murder.

item.title: Gas valve failure during routine maintenance work may have led to fatal explosion, US Steel says
item.description: U.S. Steel said its investigation indicates the explosion happened when workers were flushing a gas valve in preparation for a routine planned maintenance task.

item.title: Young couple killed in crash with wrong-way driver give back through organ donation
item.description: The couple died after a driver, who was allegedly drunk and traveling the wrong way, crashed into them as they returned home from a concert.

item.title: Thunderstorms chances higher Sunday and Monday
item.description: We have a higher chance of afternoon thunderstorms for two days

item.title: Scattered afternoon storms Sunday
item.description: Beaches could also see scattered afternoon storms Sunday

item.title: AT&T data breach victims eligible for class-action settlement
item.description: Millions of data breach victims are eligible for a class-action settlement.

item.title: Hurricane Erin 5 AM Update Sunday
item.description: Erin weakens to a Category 3 hurricane
